name: City Scape
description:
Controls: Move with wasd and zoom in and out with mouse wheel. 

Warning: Loosing gold can go into minuses, meaning that the player can no longer do anything.

A game made for a university group project based of Sim City with a medieval style. Can place different types of buildings on a grid to raise gold, materials for building and happiness of villagers. Need to be able to balance out building types.  Can also speed up time.
